text: Bruce Willis and Steve Eads and Kim Kardashian and Jonathan Cheban. Instagram / Emma Heming Willis / Twitter / Kim Kardashian West Everybody knows that half the fun of dressing up for Halloween is having someone to do it with and celebrities are no exception. We've rounded up some of our favorite celebrities who dressed up in pairs ( not necessarily with their romantic partners ) and totally slayed the Halloween game this year. This post will be updated as we see more costumes!
